Tasks.Task Description: Identify the goals and requirements for the IoT solution, including device types, data collection needs, and integration points with other Azure services.
Create a detailed architecture plan for the IoT solution, including device connectivity, data flow, and integration with Azure IoT Hub.
Set up a new Azure IoT Hub instance in the Azure portal, ensuring the correct region and pricing tier are selected.
Enable security features such as device authentication, access control policies, and encryption for data in transit and at rest.
Add devices to the IoT Hub registry and configure device identities and authentication methods.
Set up Azure IoT Hub Device Provisioning Service for automated device onboarding and provisioning.

Tasks.Task: Develop and Deploy IoT Device Code
Tasks.Task Description: Write and deploy code for IoT devices to connect to the IoT Hub and send/receive data.
Set up message routing in IoT Hub to direct device messages to appropriate endpoints such as Azure Storage or Event Hubs.
Enable monitoring and diagnostics for IoT Hub using Azure Monitor and configure alerts for device connectivity and message delivery issues.
Perform end-to-end testing of the IoT solution, including device connectivity, data flow, and integration with other Azure services.
Create detailed documentation for the IoT solution, including architecture diagrams, configuration settings, and operational procedures.
Conduct training sessions for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting the IoT solution.
Ensure the IoT solution complies with relevant regulations and standards, such as GDPR or HIPAA, and conduct regular audits.
